ComicInfo.Summary:
The story opens in Hell, and the Devil isn’t too happy with Magdalena and he steals her soul, planning to take Dinah for his own as well. But having learned from her past experiences these last few weeks, Dinah knows exactly how to use a man, any man, even the Devil, and make him her slave…that is with sex. It is not long before he is hers entirely and after she gives him what she wants, her way, he grants Magdalena her soul back, but in return Magda ages her full seven hundred years and dies, but at least she dies with her soul.Dinah than returns to the surface world buries her friend, makes peace with her father and begins a true relationship with Carl, the father of the daughter in her womb while the devil just watches in loneliness, wishing Dinah would have accepted his offer to be his queen.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-31 13:02:16. [CVDB149906]
